rawResponse:
```json
{
  "testCases": [
    {
      "title": "Successful File Upload with Valid File Type and Size",
      "description": "Verifies that a user can successfully upload a file with a valid extension and within the allowed size limit.",
      "category": "functional",
      "priority": "high",
      "steps": [
        "Step 1: Navigate to https://example.com/upload",
        "Step 2: Click the 'Choose File' button",
        "Step 3: Select a file named 'valid_file.pdf' with a size of 1 MB from the file system",
        "Step 4: Click the 'Upload' button",
        "Step 5: Verify that the message 'File uploaded successfully' is displayed",
        "Step 6: Verify that the file 'valid_file.pdf' is listed in the 'Uploaded Files' section",
        "Step 7: Verify the 'Uploaded Files' section displays the correct file size (1 MB)"
      ],
      "expectedResult": "File 'valid_file.pdf' uploads successfully, message 'File uploaded successfully' appears, and file is listed in the 'Uploaded Files' section with correct file size (1 MB).",
      "tags": ["file_upload", "pdf", "size_limit", "happy_path"]
    },
    {
      "title": "File Upload with Invalid File Extension",
      "description": "Tests that the system prevents the upload of a file with an invalid extension.",
      "category": "edge_case",
      "priority": "high",
      "steps": [
        "Step 1: Navigate to https://example.com/upload",
        "Step 2: Click the 'Choose File' button",
        "Step 3: Select a file named 'invalid_file.exe' from the file system",
        "Step 4: Click the 'Upload' button",
        "Step 5: Verify that an error message 'Invalid file type. Allowed types: pdf, doc, docx' is displayed",
        "Step 6: Verify that the file 'invalid_file.exe' is not listed in the 'Uploaded Files' section"
      ],
      "expectedResult": "Error message 'Invalid file type. Allowed types: pdf, doc, docx' is displayed, and file is not uploaded.",
      "tags": ["file_upload", "invalid_extension", "security"]
    },
    {
      "title": "File Upload with Empty File",
      "description": "Tests the system's response when attempting to upload an empty file (0 bytes).",
      "category": "edge_case",
      "priority": "medium",
      "steps": [
        "Step 1: Navigate to https://example.com/upload",
        "Step 2: Click the 'Choose File' button",
        "Step 3: Select an empty file named 'empty_file.pdf' from the file system",
        "Step 4: Click the 'Upload' button",
        "Step 5: Verify that the error message 'File is empty' is displayed",
        "Step 6: Verify that the file 'empty_file.pdf' is not listed in the 'Uploaded Files' section"
      ],
      "expectedResult": "Error message 'File is empty' is displayed, and file is not uploaded.",
      "tags": ["file_upload", "empty_file", "boundary"]
    },
    {
      "title": "File Upload Exceeding Maximum File Size Limit",
      "description": "Tests that the system prevents uploading files larger than the allowed maximum size (e.g., 10 MB).",
      "category": "edge_case",
      "priority": "high",
      "steps": [
        "Step 1: Navigate to https://example.com/upload",
        "Step 2: Click the 'Choose File' button",
        "Step 3: Select a file named 'large_file.pdf' with a size of 11 MB from the file system",
        "Step 4: Click the 'Upload' button",
        "Step 5: Verify that the error message 'File size exceeds the maximum allowed size of 10 MB' is displayed",
        "Step 6: Verify that the file 'large_file.pdf' is not listed in the 'Uploaded Files' section"
      ],
      "expectedResult": "Error message 'File size exceeds the maximum allowed size of 10 MB' is displayed, and file is not uploaded.",
      "tags": ["file_upload", "size_limit", "boundary"]
    },
    {
      "title": "File Upload with Filename Containing Special Characters",
      "description": "Tests that the system handles filenames containing special characters correctly.",
      "category": "edge_case",
      "priority": "medium",
      "steps": [
        "Step 1: Navigate to https://example.com/upload",
        "Step 2: Click the 'Choose File' button",
        "Step 3: Select a file named 'file_with_!@#$%^&*.pdf' from the file system",
        "Step 4: Click the 'Upload' button",
        "Step 5: Verify that the file uploads successfully",
        "Step 6: Verify that the file is listed in the 'Uploaded Files' section with the same name: 'file_with_!@#$%^&*.pdf'",
        "Step 7: Verify that the file can be downloaded and opened without errors"
      ],
      "expectedResult": "File uploads successfully and is listed with the correct name containing special characters. The file can be downloaded and opened.",
      "tags": ["file_upload", "special_characters", "filename"]
    },
    {
      "title": "File Upload - SQL Injection Attempt in Filename",
      "description": "Tests that the system prevents SQL injection attacks via the filename field.",
      "category": "edge_case",
      "priority": "high",
      "steps": [
        "Step 1: Navigate to https://example.com/upload",
        "Step 2: Click the 'Choose File' button",
        "Step 3: Select a file named 'file'; DROP TABLE users; --.pdf' from the file system",
        "Step 4: Click the 'Upload' button",
        "Step 5: Verify that the file upload fails or the filename is sanitized",
        "Step 6: If the upload succeeds, verify that the system logs do not indicate any SQL injection attempts",
        "Step 7: Verify that the 'users' table still exists in the database"
      ],
      "expectedResult": "The file upload fails or the filename is sanitized, and no SQL injection occurs. The 'users' table remains intact in the database.",
      "tags": ["file_upload", "security", "sql_injection"]
    },
    {
      "title": "File Upload - Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) Attempt in Filename",
      "description": "Tests that the system prevents XSS attacks via the filename field.",
      "category": "edge_case",
      "priority": "high",
      "steps": [
        "Step 1: Navigate to https://example.com/upload",
        "Step 2: Click the 'Choose File' button",
        "Step 3: Select a file named '<script>alert(\"XSS\");</script>.pdf' from the file system",
        "Step 4: Click the 'Upload' button",
        "Step 5: Verify that the file uploads successfully, or the filename is sanitized",
        "Step 6: Verify that the file is listed in the 'Uploaded Files' section, and the script tag is either removed or encoded",
        "Step 7: Click the link to download the file. Verify that the JavaScript alert does not execute."
      ],
      "expectedResult": "The file uploads (or is rejected), and the filename is sanitized. The JavaScript alert does not execute upon download.",
      "tags": ["file_upload", "security", "xss"]
    },
    {
      "title": "Simultaneous File Upload by Multiple Users",
      "description": "Tests the system's ability to handle multiple simultaneous file uploads.",
      "category": "edge_case",
      "priority": "medium",
      "steps": [
        "Step 1: Open 5 different browsers or browser profiles.",
        "Step 2: In each browser, navigate to https://example.com/upload.",
        "Step 3: In each browser, select a valid file (e.g., 'file1.pdf', 'file2.pdf', etc.) for upload.",
        "Step 4: Simultaneously click the 'Upload' button in all 5 browsers.",
        "Step 5: Verify that all 5 files are uploaded successfully and listed in the 'Uploaded Files' section for each user.",
        "Step 6: Verify that no errors or timeouts occur during the upload process."
      ],
      "expectedResult": "All 5 files are uploaded successfully without errors or timeouts.",
      "tags": ["file_upload", "concurrency", "system_limits"]
    },
    {
      "title": "Compliance: Verify Audit Log Entry for File Upload",
      "description": "Verifies that a log entry is created when a file is uploaded for auditing purposes.",
      "category": "compliance",
      "priority": "high",
      "steps": [
        "Step 1: Log in as an administrator with auditing privileges.",
        "Step 2: Navigate to https://example.com/upload.",
        "Step 3: Upload a valid file named 'audit_file.pdf'.",
        "Step 4: Navigate to the audit log section (e.g., https://example.com/audit_log).",
        "Step 5: Verify that a new log entry exists with details about the file upload:",
        "Step 6: Confirm the log shows the timestamp, user who uploaded the file, filename, and upload status (success).",
        "Step 7: Ensure the log entry is immutable."
      ],
      "expectedResult": "A detailed and immutable audit log entry is created for the file upload.",
      "tags": ["file_upload", "compliance", "audit_log"]
    },
    {
      "title": "Functional: Download Uploaded File",
      "description": "Tests the functionality to download a previously uploaded file.",
      "category": "functional",
      "priority": "medium",
      "steps": [
        "Step 1: Navigate to https://example.com/upload.",
        "Step 2: Upload a valid file named 'download_test.pdf'.",
        "Step 3: Locate the 'download_test.pdf' entry in the 'Uploaded Files' section.",
        "Step 4: Click the 'Download' button next to the file.",
        "Step 5: Verify that the file 'download_test.pdf' is downloaded to the local system.",
        "Step 6: Open the downloaded file and verify that the content is identical to the original file.",
        "Step 7: Delete the downloaded file."
      ],
      "expectedResult": "The file downloads successfully and the content is identical to the original.",
      "tags": ["file_upload", "download", "functional"]
    },
    {
      "title": "File Upload with Japanese Characters in Filename",
      "description": "Tests that the system handles filenames containing Japanese characters correctly.",
      "category": "edge_case",
      "priority": "medium",
      "steps": [
        "Step 1: Navigate to https://example.com/upload",
        "Step 2: Click the 'Choose File' button",
        "Step 3: Select a file named '日本語ファイル.pdf' from the file system",
        "Step 4: Click the 'Upload' button",
        "Step 5: Verify that the file uploads successfully",
        "Step 6: Verify that the file is listed in the 'Uploaded Files' section with the same name: '日本語ファイル.pdf'",
        "Step 7: Verify that the file can be downloaded and opened without errors"
      ],
      "expectedResult": "File uploads successfully and is listed with the correct name containing Japanese characters. The file can be downloaded and opened.",
      "tags": ["file_upload", "internationalization", "filename"]
    },
    {
      "title": "Functional: Uploading a .docx file",
      "description": "Verify a valid .docx file can be uploaded",
      "category": "functional",
      "priority": "high",
      "steps": [
        "Step 1: Navigate to https://example.com/upload",
        "Step 2: Click the 'Choose File' button",
        "Step 3: Select a file named 'valid_file.docx' with a size of 500KB from the file system",
        "Step 4: Click the 'Upload' button",
        "Step 5: Verify that the message 'File uploaded successfully' is displayed",
        "Step 6: Verify that the file 'valid_file.docx' is listed in the 'Uploaded Files' section",
        "Step 7: Verify the 'Uploaded Files' section displays the correct file size (500KB)"
      ],
      "expectedResult": "File 'valid_file.docx' uploads successfully, message 'File uploaded successfully' appears, and file is listed in the 'Uploaded Files' section with correct file size (500KB).",
      "tags": ["file_upload", "docx", "size_limit", "happy_path"]
    },
    {
      "title": "Edge Case: Attempt to upload a file when server is unavailable",
      "description": "Tests the system's handling of server unavailability during file upload.",
      "category": "edge_case",
      "priority": "high",
      "steps": [
        "Step 1: Simulate a server outage (e.g., by shutting down the server or blocking network traffic).",
        "Step 2: Navigate to https://example.com/upload.",
        "Step 3: Click the 'Choose File' button.",
        "Step 4: Select a valid file named 'server_unavailable.pdf'.",
        "Step 5: Click the 'Upload' button.",
        "Step 6: Verify that an appropriate error message is displayed (e.g., 'Service Unavailable', 'Network Error', or 'Failed to connect to server').",
        "Step 7: Verify that the file is not uploaded."
      ],
      "expectedResult": "An appropriate error message indicating server unavailability is displayed, and the file is not uploaded.",
      "tags": ["file_upload", "server_failure", "error_handling"]
    }
  ]
}
```
